Name: Expression
Description: The expression that you want to execute

Name: d-for
Description: The d-for expression that wil be used

Name: d-if
Description: The conditional that will be used to check if we will apply the expressions to the item in d-for

Name: All
Description: If enabled will apply the expression to every object that matchs the conditional otherwise only the first match

Name: Hierarchy
Description: The expression used to allow recursion
